docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Carmen Cruz has lived in the United States all of her 15 years, but after she was bitten by a neighbor's dog earlier this month she made the short trip across the border from her home in Brownsville, Tex., to an emergency room here in Mexico.

headline.main: Health Care on the Border: Poor Go to Mexico

docs.snippet: LEAD: Carmen Cruz has lived in the United States all of her 15 years, but after she was bitten by a neighbor's dog earlier this month she made the short trip across the border from her home in Brownsville, Tex., to an emergency room here in Mexico.

byline.original: By LISA BELKIN, Special to the New York Times
